titles.title: Georgetown VA Community-Based Outpatient Clinic Authorization Act of 2026
Georgetown VA Community-Based Outpatient Clinic Authorization Act of 2026

To authorize the construction of a community-based outpatient clinic in Georgetown, Texas, as a major medical facility project of the Department of Veterans Affairs for fiscal year 2027, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
